i'm still getting the same error about o: E: /var/cache/apt/archives/x-common_1.08_all.deb: trying to overwrite `/usr/lib/X11/fonts', which is also in package xfonts-base
yeah - maybe I sidestepped the problem with the uninstall reinstall thing
apt-get remove x-window-system-core xfonts-base xfonts-scalable xfonts-100dpi xfonts-75dpi
apt-get install x-window-system-core xfonts-base xfonts-scalable xfonts-100dpi xfonts-75dpi
That was what I did and it sorted the problem out and it's all updating fine nwo
the apt-getupgrade lets you install x-common then you can reinstall what you uninstalled in the first command
